ActEmergency Management Act
SubjectNo. 135 - (British Columbia) Provincial Emergencies Financial Assistance Order
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCY FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER NÂ° 135 - which makes a declaration of federal concern and authorizes the federal government to provide financial assistance to the province of BRITISH COLUMBIA with respect to the FOREST FIRES that affected the region from June 17 to September 7, 2010.
